org.asoem.greyfish.utils.math

Class RandomGenerators

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.asoem.greyfish.utils.math.RandomGenerators

  • public final class RandomGenerators
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of common functions using a RandomGenerator.

    • Method Detail

      • rng

        public static org.apache.commons.math3.random.RandomGenerator rng()
        Returns:
        a singleton instance of the default RandomGenerator. This method currently delegates to well1993c()

      • well1993c

        public static org.apache.commons.math3.random.RandomGenerator well1993c()
        Returns:
        a singleton instance of a Well19937c random generator.

      • nextBoolean

        public static boolean nextBoolean(org.apache.commons.math3.random.RandomGenerator rng,
                                  double p)
        Generate a boolean value which is true with probability p.
        Parameters:
        rng - the generator to use
        p - the probability for generating a true value
        Returns:
        true with probability p, false otherwise

      • nextInt

        public static int nextInt(org.apache.commons.math3.random.RandomGenerator rng,
                          int minIncl,
                          int maxExcl)
        Get a random value in the range [minIncl, maxExcl).
        Parameters:
        rng - the generator to use
        minIncl - the minimum inclusive value of the range
        maxExcl - the maximum exclusive value of the range
        Returns:
        a random number in [minIncl, maxExcl)

      • rnorm

        @Deprecated
public static double rnorm(org.apache.commons.math3.random.RandomGenerator rng,
                                       double mu,
                                       double sigma)
        Deprecated. Use nextNormal(org.apache.commons.math3.random.RandomGenerator, double, double)
        Generates a random value for the normal distribution with the mean equal to mu and standard deviation equal to sigma.
        Parameters:
        mu - the mean of the distribution
        sigma - the standard deviation of the distribution
        Returns:
        a random value for the given normal distribution

      • nextNormal

        public static double nextNormal(org.apache.commons.math3.random.RandomGenerator rng,
                                double mu,
                                double sigma)
        Generates a random value for the normal distribution with the mean equal to mu and standard deviation equal to sigma.
        Parameters:
        mu - the mean of the distribution
        sigma - the standard deviation of the distribution
        Returns:
        a random value for the given normal distribution

      • nextDouble

        public static double nextDouble(org.apache.commons.math3.random.RandomGenerator rng,
                                double lower,
                                double upper)
        Generates a uniformly distributed random value from the interval [lower,upper).
        Parameters:
        rng - the random generator to use
        lower - the lower bound
        upper - the upper bound
        Returns:
        a uniformly distributed random value from the interval [lower,upper)

      • rng

        public static org.apache.commons.math3.random.RandomGenerator rng(long seed)
        Get an instance of the default random number generator initialized with seed. Currently delegates to well1993c(long).
        Parameters:
        seed - the seed for the generator
        Returns:
        a new instance of the default random number generator.

      • synchronizedGenerator

        public static org.apache.commons.math3.random.RandomGenerator synchronizedGenerator(org.apache.commons.math3.random.RandomGenerator randomGenerator)
        Create a thread safe RandomGenerator wrapping given randomGenerator.
        Parameters:
        randomGenerator - the generator to wrap
        Returns:
        a thread safe RandomGenerator
        See Also:
        SynchronizedRandomGenerator

      • threadLocalGenerator

        public static org.apache.commons.math3.random.RandomGenerator threadLocalGenerator(com.google.common.base.Supplier<org.apache.commons.math3.random.RandomGenerator> generatorSupplier)
        Create a RandomGenerator which delegates all methods to a thread local instance of a generator created by the given generatorSupplier.
        Parameters:
        generatorSupplier - the factory to create the thread local instances
        Returns:
        a new generator delegating to a thread local instance
        See Also:
        ThreadLocal
